original_text: After this shall he turn his face unto the isles, and shall take many: but a prince for his own behalf shall cause the reproach offered by him to cease; without his own reproach he shall cause it to turn upon him.
korean_text: 그 후에 그가 그의 얼굴을 바닷가로 돌려 많이 점령할 것이나 한 장군이 나타나 그의 정복을 그치게 하고 그 수치를 그에게로 돌릴 것이므로

sentences.original_text: After this shall he turn his face unto the isles
sentences.korean_translation: 이 후에 그는 섬들로 얼굴을 돌릴 것이며

sentences.original_text: but a prince for his own behalf
shall cause the reproach offered by him to cease
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 행한 비난을 그치게 할 것이며

sentences.original_text: he shall cause it to turn upon him
